price: Ka ce: "Ba na mallaka wa kaina wata cũta, haka kuma wani amfãni, sai abin da Allah Ya so. Ga kõwace al'umma akwai ajali, idan ajalinsu ya zo, to, bã zã su yi jinkiri daga gare shi ba, kõ dã sã'ã guda, kuma bã zã su gabãta ba."
arabic: قُل لَّآ أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِي ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعًا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۗ لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌۚ إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā amliku linafsī ḍarran walā nafʿan illā mā shāa al-lahu likulli ummatin ajalun idhā jāa ajaluhum falā yastakhirūna sāʿatan walā yastaqdimūna
